divs: Sighting Detailsduring this time i noticed many objects moving in the sky they looked like stars,they only moved for a few seconds until i saw one that moved toward m51 galaxy and remained there for several days becoming duller by the day.these things moved every direction at the same speeds only for a short while 4 seconds max.ive seen satelites many times and i dont believe these are satelites .
